channel.title: fastapi on Emmmanuel IO
channel.description: Recent content in fastapi on Emmmanuel IO

item.title: How to set up a fastapi backend service project
item.description: As a convinced user of FastAPI I will explore in a new serie of articles how to setup a backend service with 2 databases using async interfaces: SQL: PostgreSQL + SQLAlchemy (async). NoSQL: MongoDB + Beanie (async) N.B. I know there are existing solutions which are readily available from the FastAPI website, the point here is to propose something new with a twist, call it geek. Setting up the root folder We will use docker-compose to run the databases in containers.
